hero.title: Our Programs
hero.subtitle: Comprehensive solutions to transform lives in Africa

education.title: Education Programs
education.introText: Education is the foundation for breaking the cycle of poverty. Our schools provide quality education to orphans and vulnerable children, with specialized programs for children with disabilities.

items.title: Our Primary Schools
items.text: Serving over 300 students with quality primary education, including specialized classes for children with disabilities.

items.title: Training Institutes
items.text: Provides marketable skills in tailoring, carpentry, knitting, and more for youth who cannot afford traditional schooling.

items.title: Scholarship Program
items.text: Supports secondary and university education for qualifying students to pursue higher education.

medical.title: Medical Care Programs
medical.introText: Access to healthcare is critical for the well-being of children and families in our community. Our medical programs address both immediate health needs and long-term wellness.

items.title: Medical Clinics
items.text: Provides general medical care, HIV/AIDS treatment, maternal health services, and health education to over 500 patients monthly.

items.title: HIV/AIDS Treatment Program
items.text: Comprehensive care including antiretroviral therapy, counseling, and nutritional support for HIV+ individuals.

items.title: Emergency Medical Fund
items.text: Provides financial assistance for critical medical needs including surgeries, cancer treatment, and congenital conditions.

childrensHome.title: Children's Home
childrensHome.introText: A safe, loving environment for orphans and vulnerable children who have no other family to care for them.

items.title: Residential Care
items.text: Provides housing, nutrition, healthcare, and emotional support for children ages 2 months to 17 years.

items.title: Family-Style Living
items.text: Children live in small groups with dedicated caregivers to create a family environment.

items.title: Holistic Development
items.text: Focuses on spiritual, emotional, physical, and educational growth for each child.

sustainability.title: Sustainability Programs
sustainability.introText: Long-term solutions that create self-sufficiency for individuals and the organization.

items.title: Our Farms
items.text: Extensive farm land producing food for our programs while teaching sustainable agriculture techniques.

items.title: Income-Generating Projects
items.text: Includes vocational graduate businesses, farm produce sales, and craft production to support our programs.

items.title: Community Development
items.text: Partners with local families to improve economic stability through microloans and skills training.
